price: بی‌تردید، الله دانای نهانِ آسمان‌ها و زمین است [و] اوست که به رازِ دل‌ها داناست.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha ʿālimu ghaybi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
